main event: A UFO sighting was reported near Egg Harbor City, New Jersey on October 13, 1958, described as a round, bluish-white object the size of a dime.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes and was observed from the ground visually.
The object was seen moving in a south-west direction and was around 15,000 feet above the ground.
The weather at the time of the sighting was clear with specific wind speed and temperature details provided.
The observer was a civilian named Mrs. [REDACTED], a housewife from Cape May, NJ, and her reliability was unknown.
The report requested full compliance with AFR 200-2, showing an official interest in following regulations for UFO sightings.
sighted object: round, bluish-white object the size of a dime
